medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports RUQ cramping pain of 5 days duration that radiates to her back. She was admitted 5 days ago for approximately 48 hours and diagnosed with viral colitis and a UTI. After discharge, she experienced no improvement in the pain, prompting her return. She has a history of similar pain approximately one month ago that started after dinner and lasted about 4 hours, resolving without intervention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: TAE of rectal adenocarcinoma pT2 with LVI, negative margins; completed chemotherapy and radiotherapy; macular degeneration; hypertension; urinary tract infection.
